price: 36. Waxaana nidhi: Aada qoladaa beeniyey Aayadahayaga, markaasaan baabbi’innay (qolodii Fircoon) baabbi’in dhan.
arabic: فَقُلۡنَا ٱذۡهَبَآ إِلَى ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا فَدَمَّرۡنَٰهُمۡ تَدۡمِيرٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: faqul'nā idh'habā ilā al-qawmi alladhīna kadhabū biāyātinā fadammarnāhum tadmīran
